thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com | 3 of 173
thread.title: Anne

author: Anne
title: Anne
text:
I purchased a bracelet and earrings from Arnold Jewelers. The jewelry arrived a day earlier than expected and I could not be more pleased! Both pieces of jewelry are absolutely beautiful! Rebecca responded promptly to questions and has a very strong customer focus. The jewelry arrived in beautiful presentation boxes with a hand written thank you note from Christine. I highly recommend Arnold Jewelers and would not hesitate to purchase from them in the future.
Thank you.
Anne
